calendar.title: You're Invited!
calendar.invitation: This special day is not just a milestone, but the beginning of our journey to build a unique and happy home together! We are incredibly excited and can't wait to celebrate and share this momentous joy with everyone. We sincerely hope to welcome you to join us on this meaningful day!
calendar.polaroidQuote: Some souls just understand each other.

bride.title: The Bride
bride.name: H·ªìng Vi√™n
bride.description: "A cheerful and witty girl who always brings laughter and warmth to everyone around her. She loves cooking and beauty care, and knows how to turn the little things in life into endless joy."

groom.title: The Groom
groom.name: Thanh Phong
groom.description: "A responsible and mature man with a humorous personality. Always gives his best at work and cares deeply about his family. Passionate about technology and always seeking new things in life."

2016.title: The Beginning
2016.description: We met during our high school years when our teachers assigned us to sit together. Who would have thought that this small seating arrangement would be the beginning of a long story...

2017.title: Awkward but Happy
2017.description: We spent our first year still a bit awkward, stumbling into university together. Having each other every school day was enough.

2018.title: Memorable Youth
2018.description: We enjoyed our beautiful student days together. From late-night study sessions to weekend trips, even the arguments followed by making up...

2019.title: Deeper in Love
2019.description: Our love became stronger and we understood each other better. From two strangers back then, we've now become each other's solid support in life.

2020.title: Weathering the Storm
2020.description: A year of challenges, but also the year we learned how to overcome difficulties together. With each challenge we faced, our love grew stronger.

2021.title: Growing Together
2021.description: Growing up together, stepping into our working lives, sharing stories about work and life with each other.

2022.title: Peaceful Moments
2022.description: Finding happiness in the simplest things. Raising our (cat) children 'Nh·∫Ωo' and 'C√°m' together.

2023.title: Shaping Our Future
2023.description: A year of travels, chill moments, and enjoying peaceful life together.

2024.title: Ready for New Chapter
2024.description: Feeling that our love was strong enough and mature enough to enter a new chapter. Each passing day was preparation for an important decision...

2025.title: A Promise for Life
2025.description: Feeling our love was ready, the groom proposed. And the bride said yes, ready to embark on this new journey as husband and wife.

2026.title: Coming Home Together
2026.description: The day we officially move in together, building our home and continuing to write our love story.

welcome.title: Guest Reception
welcome.description: The first gentle moments for everyone to take photos, chat, and share the joy with us.

ceremony.title: Wedding Ceremony
ceremony.description: Everyone will join us to mark this meaningful moment, signifying a new chapter in our journey together.

party.title: Celebration Party
party.description: Let's enjoy the most memorable moments of the day together, raise a glass and party hard!
